channel.title: A general item
channel.description:
Well I was thinking what I could buy with $40?
Any type of item like a household item or a game or a program or a toy
Excluding: mp3s/ipods phones usb's memory cards cigars/cigarettes weed drugs in general
I just want to spend it so anything would be great just post :cool:

item.title: A general item

item.description:
@Cbot wrote:

Invest in American stock markets

Read full topic

item.title: A general item
item.dc:creator: @933pm 933pm
item.description:
@933pm wrote:

[quote=“cane, post:45, topic:299710”][quote author=Arr0w link=topic=395999.msg2943587#msg2943587 date=1252074803]
Saving it will be useless, you’ll come to this again when you get bored of saving, unless you find a thing you want to buy and then save up for that.
[/quote]
Saving your money is not really useless. Infact saving your money is how you do not become a failure.[/quote]

Very true, make sure you save a good amount but don’t be afraid to spend some once in a while

Read full topic

item.title: A general item
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“BloodRayne, post:39, topic:299710”][quote author=Kane. link=topic=395999.msg2942335#msg2942335 date=1251974682]
Why do people just want to throw their money away on shit suggested from other people?
Save it in case you really need it.
[/quote]
Only smart answer here. I don’t get why kids think it’s so necessary to spend the money you get? Just save it… Don’t go looking for something to spend it on, chances are you’ll realize you don’t need what you bought the week after.[/quote]
You’re only right because he said we can’t list weed as something to buy with it.

off topic : someone ban 933pm plz.

Read full topic

[quote=“Kane., post:20, topic:299710”]Why do people just want to throw their money away on shit suggested from other people?
Save it in case you really need it.[/quote]

Only smart answer here. I don’t get why kids think it’s so necessary to spend the money you get? Just save it… Don’t go looking for something to spend it on, chances are you’ll realize you don’t need what you bought the week after.

item.title: A general item
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“933pm, post:30, topic:299710”][quote author=la­wl link=topic=395999.msg2942757#msg2942757 date=1252010529]

I spend like 90% of my money on clothes, idk if you’re into that
[/quote]U must be homosexual.

false

I spend like 90% of my money on clothes, idk if you’re into that

I do like buying clothes but I already have enough.

Friends?

When we go out to eat we each have our own money and anyways I have more money in my ‘stash’ but these $40 I just want to spend. [Maybe if I don’t find anything I’d like I’ll just save it]

you never have enough clothes

shutup fagboy

sorry I like to leave my basement sometimes[/quote]
so you’re implying nudists are basement dwellers…

Read full topic
